hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"The Messenger of Allah would love to start with the right side when he purified himself, and when he combed, and when putting his sandals on

chapter.ara-name: باب ما يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنَ التَّيَمُّنِ فِي الطُّهُورِ
chapter.eng-name: That Starting From The Right Is Recommended In Purification
